text: Juhani Tapio Antero Kärkinen (28 October 1935 – 29 August 2019) was a Finnish ski jumper. He won a gold medal in the large hill at the 1958 World Ski Championships. He placed eighth in the normal hill at the 1960 Winter Olympics. He was born in Kotka, Finland. Kärkinen died on 29 August 2019 in Lahti, Finland at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Olympians for Finland Category:Finnish skiers Category:Kymenlaakso
title: Juhani Kärkinen
